greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Expansion of x * (1 - x)^2 * (1 - x^2) / (1 - x^6) in powers of x.
formula: Multiplicative with a(2^e) = 2*(-1)^e if e>0, a(3^e) = 0 if e>0, a(p^e) = 1 if p == 1 (mod 6), a(p^e) = (-1)^e if p == 5 (mod 6).
G.f.: -(f(x) + 3*f(-x)) / 2 where f(x) := x / (1 - x + x^2). - _Michael Somos_, May 04 2015
a(n) = -a(3 - n) = a(n+6), a(3*n) = 0 for all n in Z.
results.author: _Michael Somos_, Sep 02 2005
